== Debugging Nautilus ==

=== Debugging the Ubuntu Package ===

=== Procedure ===

 1. Disable auto-restart by editing <code>/usr/share/applications/nautilus.desktop</code> and set the <code>X-GNOME-Autostart-Notify</code> key to <code>false</code>.
 2. Restart your current GNOME session by logging out and logging back in.
 3. One you have your bulid environment set-up, stop the current nautilus session with <code>nautilus -q</code>.
